observations: Critical assembly loading error: 'Could not load type Dnn.PersonaBar.Library.Dto.Permissions from assembly Dnn.PersonaBar.Library, Version=10.1.1.0' prevents all permissions functionality
The DETAILS tab of folder properties works correctly, showing folder name, workflow, versioning settings
The PERMISSIONS tab exists in the UI but its content fails to render - only Cancel and Save buttons are displayed
Code review shows the permissions functionality is implemented in GetPermissionsData() and SavePermissions() methods in AssetsController.cs (lines 1379-1440)
The FolderPermissions DTO class exists and extends a base Permissions class that loads permission definitions via PermissionController.GetPermissionsByFolder()
The error suggests a version mismatch or missing dependency in Dnn.PersonaBar.Library assembly
All folder edit operations trigger HTTP 500 errors when loading permissions data
This appears to be a deployment/configuration issue rather than a code logic bug
